title: (1 Month FREE) South Austin Upscale Community!
posting_body: Check out this Modern apartment in the heart of South Austin!
Boasting walkability to the South Park Meadows shopping center and easy access to I35 to get you downtown in less than 10 minutes!
Pet-Friendly Community with an Onsite Dog Park, Community Lounge, and Walking distance to restaurants, shops, and bars!
This apartment home is hosting an impressive amount of onsite amenities including a Coffee Bar, Bocce Ball & Ping Pong Table, Business Center, Outdoor Kitchenette & Gas Grilling Stations!
Get a full range of workouts at the State-of-the-Art 24/7 Fitness Center & Yoga Studio and then show off your hard work at the Resort-Style Pool with Lounge Deck!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
